description: Facilitating Palestinian National Reconciliation & Promoting Scial Cohesion. Outcome 1, Output 1.1.2 Crisis & conflict prevented & mitigated.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1.- Agreements promoted between the main Palestinian groups through platforms for dialogue, negotiation and consensus building on mutually selected issues, fostering conditions for national reconciliation

2.- National capacities for research on conflict and development strengthened in order to feed into Palestinian policy making and national dialogue

3.- Youth and University students have been empowered through their own organizations and networks as a catalyst for dialogue and national reconciliation
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Reconciliation & Soc. Cohesion
